mapper.select: SELECT psa.spu_id as attr_spu_id, psa.sale_attr_id, psa.sale_attr_name, psav.id, psav.spu_id as attr_value_spu_id, psav.sale_attr_id as sale_attr_id1, psav.sale_attr_value_name, if(ssav.id,1,0) as is_checked FROM pms_product_sale_attr psa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value psav ON psa.spu_id = psav.spu_id AND psa.sale_attr_id = psav.sale_attr_id AND psa.spu_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssav.sale_attr_value_id = psav.id and ssav.sku_id = #{skuId} GROUP BY psa.spu_id, psa.sale_attr_id, psa.sale_attr_name, psav.id, psav.spu_id, psav.sale_attr_id, psav.sale_attr_value_name, ssav.id
